description: The ENROLL_REC_HX table contains a history of patient enrollment deletions and undeletions.

columns.name: ENROLL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient enrollment record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the ENROLL_INFO table.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SDFL_EDIT_INSTANT
columns.description: The instant that the record status was changed

columns.name: SDFL_EDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: The user who changed the record status

columns.name: SDFL_EDIT_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The action that was applied to the record status


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Soft Delete


Undo Delete
